title: Grachnid Cave
content: The Grachnid Cave is a room within the Mine of Mantuban that contains a grachnid and cave moss, the latter of which is used in the Nullify More Corruption quest. To reach the cave moss, the player must step on the correct tiles as shown in the image to the right, as treading on an incorrect tile will force the player to the entrance of the cave and mark the tile with gravel.
